sections.content: Cross Country Ski Trail Conditions as of February 11, 2026 –

Bucks Run will be groomed for skate and classic skiing. The connector trail between the ski center and Bucks Run is open. For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.
Will be open February 14th & February 15th weather permitting. Trails are groomed.

sections.header: Ski rentals are required to be purchased in advance online.
sections.content: Click here to rent ski equipment. If you’re having difficulty with our online rental process, click here for a quick reference guide on how to rent ski equipment online.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Snow was added to trail today.  So it is a little soft for skating.  But still very skiable from building and back is still there.Disappointing to see the snow guns put away today.  Long term forecast shows cold for several weeks after this few day warm up.  Looks like they are giving up already.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Fresh groom this morning for the skate deck & classic tracks. Exceptional conditions!!!

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 chairlifts, Rope Tow and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails were groomed and tracked Tuesday morning. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: It looks like a great day to ski. The snow quality continues to be in very good condition and the high temperature is 27 degrees. Last night there was some light rain that turned to snow, this moisture should further improve the snow quality today. We are proud to host the historic Little Brown Jug race at 2:00 p.m. today. The Little Brown Jug is a battle of the bay between the Harbor Springs and Petoskey Middle School ski teams. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. The lifts will turn from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
